to: Phyllis Cowart, Coordinator of Records Management
note: You will receive a separate memorandum providing you with any new record category codes or with reasons for denial of requested additions or changes.
descriptionNote: You must attach a description of records in each new category requested and reasons for any suggested retention period changes.

requestedRevisionCodes.ADD: Add to the records retention schedule
requestedRevisionCodes.DEL: Delete from the records retention schedule
requestedRevisionCodes.CRP: Change the retention period for a category
